posts.post_content:
Both cards sold. To the buyers: Please don't needlessly bump this thread to say "thank you" when you receive the cards. If there's a problem, by all means post. But it makes no sense to make a needless post that results only in other seller's threads being bumped down. Thanks, Rob

I received a couple emails about these -- even before I posted, which is kind of strange. Sorry, I'm not open to a trade.

If you have any questions, feel free to PM or [URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]email me[/URL].

Prices are delivered within the United States.

PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment.

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes:

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol dot com[/URL]

Brain SOLD

Gandil SOLD
too late for the Gandil but I will take the Brain. Thanks
